Text:
Loved the movie and quality..Stupid me gave up on the french subs and stuck with the rest lol...this movie relies on french..I give the quality 9A and 9V..can anyone tell me why i  now need AC3 audio instead of MP3.........I like to burn movies for me and my dad, but with the old fashioned MP3 I could do that...now with AC3 I get a perfect movie and no sound..If I need a simple app, that would be appreciated..Especially since thic PC is only 2 months old I figure it's an app prob, not  mine...

Thanks to all you appreciative downloaders like me :-)
